title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4227.5 - Judges may declare race void, order refund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4227.5 - Judges may declare race void, order refund

State Regulations

The judges shall have the authority to declare a race
void and to order all wagers made thereon refunded if they shall determine that
any occurrence before or during the running of such race calls for such action
by them. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4227.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
